title: Support for BT A2DP Sink
body:
I would like to have A2DP Sink profile on windows 10, specially on IoT Core, I know that most of the times is related to the drivers of the BT chip, but citing your site "the following RFCOMM services are not supported:
.
:
:
Audio Source (0x110A) and Sink (0x110B)

comments.body: Good news, friends! Microsoft snuck A2DP SNK profile support into Build 17763 of the commercial releases of Windows IoT Core! The release note wording is a little weird, but I'm going to pull it down and give it a try with my device.
I would love to see the Sink added soon...
The receive profile was added in a recent commercial build - I'm hoping this bodes well for sink as well!
